segments.text: How many people are there in your family ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Five.My father , mother , brother , sister-in-law and me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is your brother older or younger than you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He is five years older than me , He got married last Sunday.My brother and my sister-in-law are the same age .
segments.speaker: S2
